=== kfw-rok (Korea 1951) ===

HoB: +3/+4 DRM
Red TH# (ROK) ; Black (KMC)
OBA: 10B 3R (access: â‰¤ 1 (ROK) ; 2 (KMC))
- Plentiful Ammo included

Republic of Korea (ROK):
* Early KW ROK rules
* 1st Line MMC:
  * Battle-Harden to Fanatic
* 2nd Line & Conscript MMC:
  * Always Lax
  * Deploy NA

Korean Marine Corps (KMC):
* U.S.-Armed KMC
* SW B#/X#/ROF penalty
